name: Probability of superiority
disambiguatingDescription: Is the probability that a speaker/text picked randomly from the subcorpus with a larger mean value of the target variable will have a higher score than a speaker/text picked from the subcorpus with a lower mean value.
description: Is the probability that a speaker/text picked randomly from the subcorpus with a larger mean value of the target variable will have a higher score than a speaker/text picked from the subcorpus with a lower mean value.
